Classes in com.ojcoleman.ahni.evaluation used by com.ojcoleman.ahni.experiments
AHNIFitnessFunction
          Base class for fitness functions that provides some extra capabilities used by AHNI.
BulkFitnessFunctionMT
          Provides a base for multi-threaded bulk fitness functions.
HyperNEATFitnessFunction
          Provides a base for fitness functions for use with HyperNEAT.
HyperNEATTargetFitnessFunction
          Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.
TargetFitnessFunctionMT
          Given a set of genotypes that encode a neural network, and a set of training examples consisting of input and target (desired) output pattern pairs, determines fitness based on how close the output of the network encoded by each genome is to the target output given some input.
